attributes.action: Send Jeremy Corbyn to Syria to broker peace with the head of ISIS
attributes.background: Jeremy Corbyn believes we should not attack ISIS in Syria or Iraq and the west is at fault for this and the only way to stop this is to make peace with ISIS. We should send Jeremy Corbyn to Syria to meet the head of ISIS and broker a peace deal.

rejection.details: The actions of the Leader of the Opposition are not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament as a whole.
